website_summaries.verdict: Choose this collection of 13 vegetable seed varieties if you are more concerned about planting organic than quantity.
cons: Fewer seeds and varieties than other seed packs

customer_reviews.title: Complete Beginner, All Seeds Sprouted!
customer_reviews.text: I know absolutely nothing about gardening, but decided to get into it with these seeds. So far I've only planted some of the kale, lettuce, and tomato seeds, and they all sprouted!
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Collins

customer_reviews.title: Only a few seeds per package
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money - there are only a dozen-ish seeds per package. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Glowa

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds, great results
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They are organic and heirloom. Most all of them have sprouted. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn From Maine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I am being fair
customer_reviews.text: The amount of seeds in a package on the average seemed a bit low. I had a hard time growing the seeds. Some germinated well and some didn't. I think that the placement of the seeds relative to sunlight and the heat onset that came much more quickly than I would have thought. I would purchase the seeds again I suppose. Arizona is a tough place to grow plants from seeds unless they are germinated indoors at the onset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely presented.  Easy to grow.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be quiet easy to grow. I opened and used four of the packages right away. Seeds sprout really quickly. Good product so far
customer_reviews.author: birdybird

customer_reviews.title: Sprouted well
customer_reviews.text: I started growing the broccoli and they spouted really fast. Not sure about the leafy greens (bought this a while ago so I think it was letus?) They sprouted but then all would shrivel up and die. I had them in jars with dirt and some drainage and tried them both in direct and indirect light. Not really sure what happened but probably my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Worst seed germination rate and growth
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money on this, very few germinate and even those did not grow. I have planted seeds from other companies and they have all grown fine. Never buying this again and would recommend to just go to a store and buy it from there since you are just getting no return if you buy this
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of starter seeds
customer_reviews.text: Found them on a fb site. Went to website and read about them some more. Liked what they were saying and order some seeds. Delivery was quick. Packaging was very nice. Planted most of the packs this week will update on the growth when I can.
customer_reviews.author: I. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Cool retro packets, plenty of seeds per packet and a great variety. Started growing without issue; quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: it really less seeds in it, I haven't plant them however I was expecting little bit more
customer_reviews.text: They give the seeds with grams some seeds are big so it has really less seeds for this price...
customer_reviews.author: Cenkc

customer_reviews.title: Great value with a catch
customer_reviews.text: I took a star off as I can’t get the eggplant or tomatoes to germinate to save my life. I am in California crop country so it’s not my environment. But I’ll keep trying, because you never know!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful seedlings!
customer_reviews.text: These seeds started sprouting right away and are going strong. The tomato varieties did take longer to come up but they are healthy. I like the variety of seeds and the uniqueness of these heirloom plants. I will probably buy again if I forget to harvest the seeds off the plants!
customer_reviews.author: Emily L. Jankord

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They keep dying; maybe the rain, maybe something else. I dont believe its the seeds. Rain keeps washing neem off and bugs are thick.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Non GMO seeds
customer_reviews.text: Lots of seeds and gmo, which can feed a whole family for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Snow

customer_reviews.title: Nothing grew....
customer_reviews.text: Planted these, watered them and so far nothing has grown. Pricey and doesn't grow. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value on very interesting veggies!
customer_reviews.text: What a great variety of seeds for the price! Everything tried thus far has germinated well, very viable seeds. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get organic seeds for my garden this year, but only half of what I planted came up (and I tested starting some as seedlings inside and some directly in the ground). The rainbow carrots probably did the best with sprouting and the tomatoes did the worst. Only ONE sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S

customer_reviews.title: All of them sprouted right away
customer_reviews.text: will see how they grow from here but very happy they were good seeds
customer_reviews.author: Russel Kelner

customer_reviews.title: Good except eggplants
customer_reviews.text: Plants are doing well — especially my kale and broccoli. One star off because none of the eggplant seeds sprouted. I planted nearly 20 in separate cells (same way I start all seeds). I’m wondering if I just got a bad batch. Too bad since I was looking forward to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection at a good price. As with many heirlooms, perhaps not as prolific or hardy but fun to try new and interesting varieties.,
customer_reviews.author: donna reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety! Every single one of the seeds germinated. Definitely my go to seed company now!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Knapp

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Good variety. Looks like all the seeds are growing well.
customer_reviews.author: DaveTheMechanic

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are being used in Aero gardens and I love them! They are growing after a couple of days. My kids are so excited, and everyday we see new growth. There were some left over for next time and to start a true garden!
customer_reviews.author: Crazymomof4

customer_reviews.title: They failed to grow
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately none of this seeds grew. I planted them 3 different times and nothing, no plants:-( very disappointed and so were my kids. I’m an experienced Gardner and all my others seeds took
customer_reviews.author: Leslie haws

customer_reviews.title: None of them seeded
customer_reviews.text: Well none of them seeded. First time I had this level of failure from seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Msk

customer_reviews.title: Fun Funky Varieties
customer_reviews.text: Love these fun funky varieties. So far so good with germination, excited to see them grow!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Smith

customer_reviews.title: most of theses seeds didn't even germinate
customer_reviews.text: the packaging looked really good, but these must have been old seeds. most of the seeds never germinated, what a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: WisconsinThanksgiving

customer_reviews.title: Excited to grow but need to try again.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product. Unfortunately my first batch of seedlings we all unsuccessful. I will try another batch soon. Probably just my luck, I don’t have a green thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Seni1017

customer_reviews.title: seedlings are now sprouting
customer_reviews.text: Seedlings have sprouted super fast and they look very healthy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of useful seeds.
customer_reviews.text: Great variety. Already enjoying the new garden, both indoor and out.
customer_reviews.author: BillW

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Great variety. Great price. Started growing in a week when we planted them at our child’s preschool
customer_reviews.author: Valeriya

customer_reviews.title: Quick receipt of Organic Non-GMO Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Seeds arrived with good directions. We started them indoors and are hoping to plant outside late April.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Really like the packaging. Gave to my sister as a gift for housewarming. Should have taken a picture. Seems like good quality. Came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best seeds ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set last year and then couldn't grow most of them due to surgery. (Last year I did do some tomatoes and they were awesome.) I took the chance this year to just go ahead and see what happened, even though they were for last year. Everything sprouted and I ate gorgeous radish and arugula today. The kale, cabbage, and broccoli are coming along nicely, as are the tomatoes. I'm super impressed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Different & Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These were so fun to grow! Every seed planted grew perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert James White

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, non gmo organic seeds! Great variety for the start to any garden. Healing the food system one rebel garden at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tawfik

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great packaging, high quality organic seeds! So glad to have organic non GMO seeds to grow in my greenhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: such an awesome variety of veggies & love that they’re organic & non gmo!! Also, super fast shipping !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great heirloom variety!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome package and so glad they are gmo free!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stock

product_meta.title: Heirloom Vegetable Seeds - 13 Varieties of Organic Non-GMO Open Pollinated Garden Seed for Planting - Weird and Rare Varieties Perfect for Kids and School Gardens
product_meta.description:
Grow Food At Home, School, Community Garden, or Anywhere 

This curated garden seed set is the perfect choice for a gardener looking to grow rare, unique, & different varieties of vegetables. The heirloom varieties in this variety set are not the plants you will typically find in a garden. 
While kids love to garden, having them plant this set is extra fun. The varieties look weird but still taste great, which means children get to have fun planting, watching them grow, and eating them. This set is also perfect for school gardens. Why grow boring broccoli when you can grow the interesting, fun, and fractal Romanesco broccoli? 

This set includes: 
Speckles Lettuce 
Dinosaur Kale 
Golden Jubilee Tomatoes 
Rocket Arugula 
Red Acre Cabbage 
Rainbow Blend Carrots 
Romanesco Broccoli 
Cocozelle Zucchini 
Purple Plum Radish 
Yellow Pear Tomatoes 
Snowy Eggplants 
Green Zebra Tomatoes 
Snowball Cauliflower 

Join with Rebel Gardens in saying no to GMO's, mono-culture, and our industrialized food system by planting your own seeds & growing the rebellion.
feature_bullets: GROW 13 DIFFERENT VEGETABLES - Speckles Lettuce, Dinosaur Kale, Golden Jubilee Tomatoes, Rocket Arugula, Red Acre Cabbage, Rainbow Blend Carrots, Romanesco Broccoli, Cocozelle Zucchini, Purple Plum Radish, Yellow Pear Tomatoes, Snowy Eggplants, Green Zebra Tomatoes, and Snowball Cauliflower
HIGH GERMINATION RATE - Seeds are grown, harvested, and packed in the USA and guaranteed to grow
CERTIFIED ORGANIC - All seeds are organic, heirloom, and Non-GMO. Grow and eat with confidence that you got the best.

A GREAT GIFT IDEA - This fun and funky selection of weird vegetables is a great gift for kids or the gardener who has it all, it is also perfect for school gardens. With certified compostable packaging and 100% recycled packets this also makes a wonderful gift for the green living, zero waste loving person in your life.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If anything does not meet your standards let us know and we will make it right.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
